title: Friends by Mail
content: I was reading a story in the
magazine about a girl who was collecting dresses for people in another country who were in an earthquake (
August 2011). I thought I wanted to do the same thing. So my mom helped me collect 84 dresses for girls in Africa. We called it “Dresses for Darlings.”
I was reading the October 2012 copy of the

about Mike on the bus when Braden was saying bad words. On the bus the next day, someone was making fun of me and of other people’s talents. It made me feel bad, so I sang a Primary song with my best friend. It made me feel happy inside.
story in the September 2012 issue of the
Sometimes my brother moans in the morning when my mom tries to wake him up for school. Reading the story helped me be more patient.
Madie and Avery H., and Brandon and Austin F., ages 4, 7, 7, and 9, Florida, USA
